title: Ranchitas Salad with Ranchitas Nacho Queso
instructions: Step 1. Cook the ground beef together with the black beans, green pepper, and corn kernels until you have something similar to a picadillo.
Step 2. Season to taste with pepper and garlic-cilantro seasoning.
Step 3. Remove from heat and assemble the salad.
Step 4. Start with a layer of lettuce and tomato, then add the meat mixture and Ranchitas Nacho Queso from Yummies. Garnish with avocado, sour cream, and cheese.
description: A complete and nutritious salad with ground beef, beans and the special crunch of Ranchitas Nacho Queso.
